EnronOnline LLC and Enron North America CorpMark and Tana I have been given your name by Justin Boyd as someone who can help me or point me in the right direction We need to raise a power of attorney to enable Amita Gosalia of Enron House to execute EnronOnline Password Applications for each of the above company Please could you let me know if you can prepare such a document and also what if any additional information you require I have attached a copy of the Power of Attorney which we use in the UK for such authority for your information Unfortunately this is becoming quite urgent and any assistance you can give will be greatly appreciated Please let me know if you have any queries Thanks and regards
